committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A joint resolution to authorize the President to issue a proclamation designating the week beginning on September 30 through October 6, 1979, "International Motion Picture Week".

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to designate the week of September 30 through October 6, 1979, as "International Motion Picture Week."

titles.title: A joint resolution to authorize the President to issue a proclamation designating the week beginning on September 30 through October 6, 1979, "International Motion Picture Week".
